name: Simple_Miner
desc: These guys are the cream of the crop!

desc: They supprisingly have good mining techniques!

name: Power_Miners
desc: Editor Note: This game is getting so age restricted from all of the miners.

desc: The run on a crank, but it's not a bad start to automation.

name: Squirrels
desc: Do not underestimate them when they want their acorns.

desc: They came for the free pizza they serve at lunch time.

name: Ghostly_Miners
desc: There's plenty of them in District 12.

name: Steve
desc: Is that Steve from the hit game Minecraft!?
